name: Heartlink
description:
Heartlink is a game prototype for Godot Wild Jam #21.

This is a game about people and connections and the urge to be relevant.
Find the lanterns of those who is important to you and connect to them. 
Avoid evil thoughts and external turbulence in a form of monsters.

This is not a finished game, but hopefully you'll find it enjoyable. Have fun :)

Code by Wyrmling

Art by Nuketurne

Music & sound by Syskrank
